amendment.description: Amendment requires judges to report to the Administrative Office of the United States Courts various findings for each case in which a life sentence is imposed; and requires the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to annually compile and report such findings to the Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section providing for a study of the impact of the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 161 (Roll no. 63).
